QuestData.Title: You'll Never Walk Alone
QuestData.Description:
<You have stumbled upon some messy notes. Some of the lines seem incomprehensible while others seem melodic.>
Like wind and rain, discord storms my mind, tossing and blowing. ... I must find the golden skies. ... Remember, walk on, heart full of hope, and you'll never walk alone.
<It seems as though an aspirant cannot find their way home. You should inform someone at Hero's Rest.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Turn these notes in to Inkiep in Hero's Rest.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, these wise words are certainly Eurgon's. I'm happy to report he made it home.
